entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support ephemeral execution for `dotnet tool run` similar to npx, docker, and uv #47517
  • ApiCompat tool incorrectly handles RequiredUnreferencedCodeAttribute and possible other AOT attributes. #47513
  • Use CDN urls instead of blob.core.windows.net for downloading runtime/aspnetcore assets #47503
  • Ensure `TestTfmsInParallel` works for the new dotnet test experience #47496
    10.0.1xx
  • Consider using interpolated string handlers for `LogTrace` in new dotnet test experience #47495
    10.0.1xx
  • New dotnet test experience should produce binlog for the evaluation done to calculate TestModules #47494
    10.0.1xx

Closed

  • How to add .dcproj into solution via dotnet sdk #4100
  • Unable to use `dotnet sln add` to add an esproj to a solution #36617
    Backlog
  • `dotnet list package` command is not functioning after upgrading to 9.0.200 when an SLNX solution file is present in the folder #46763
  • Case sensitivity for `/bl` is incosistent #47481

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #47526
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add comment for updating version #47520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Roll back to previous SDK #47519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: file-scoped namespaces and namespace adjustments #47516
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Put only hard fingerprinted files into import map during publish #47515
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #47514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • ToolManifestFinder detect .slnx #47512
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Update Microsoft.AspNetCore.Watch.BrowserRefresh to net8.0 #47509
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix dotnet format failure to handle slnx files #47508
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Improve logging in dotnet test #47507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add command 'dotnet project add' #47500
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Extract RuntimeAnalyzers infra from redist #47499
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rely on RunCommand for the new dotnet test experience for MTP #47493
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Cleanup TFM handling for the new dotnet test for MTP #47489
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.104 March 2025 Updates #47466
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SDK-PR-guide.md to include inter-branch codeflow #47420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set PackageProjectUrl in Directory.Build.props instead of sdk.proj #47506
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #47498
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR: remove FallbackPublicBaseURL from sdk.proj #47505
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exit if restore/build failure in dotnet test #47450
    Area-dotnet test
  • Extract nuget packages from redist-installer infra #47502
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rename VSMSBuildExtensions and VSTemplateLocator and move under src/Layout #47501
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.3xx] add a flag to let users opt into serial builds of inner-RID containers #47472
    Area-Containers
  • Generate the sdk msi bundles inside the VMR on windows BuildPass=2 verticals #47397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47473
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use exe file if it exists in dotnet test #47454
    Area-dotnet test
  • Add spec for `dotnet run file.cs` #47020
    documentation, Area-run-file
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    Area-run-file
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #47476
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #47465
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #47490
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix global properties not propagating in new dotnet test for MTP #47464
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #47477
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #47457
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0.1xx #47470
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #47469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to the 9.0.3 release #47479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add version property for Microsoft.VisualStudio.SolutionPersistence #47474
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Reworked asset comparison #47428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Permit specifying to use workload versions in global.json #47421
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • `dotnet package list` command should restore first #47400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.2.25160.1 #47447
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] add a flag to let users opt into serial builds of inner-RID containers #47475
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Revert changes to NativeAot test due to runtime update #47443
    untriaged, Area-NativeAOT
